rows.label: qst701406_msg0001
rows.name: Oh, hello! Nice to see you again!

rows.label: qst701406_msg0002
rows.name: Have you had news from Thales?

rows.label: qst701406_msg0003
rows.name:
Now, Sharla, I don't want you to be
alarmed, but... Your teacher, he's...

rows.label: qst701406_msg0004
rows.name:
He's...really dead? And Trigo,
destroyed? I...I can't believe it...

rows.label: qst701406_msg0005
rows.name:
This...this isn't real... I mean, he was
only just here...

rows.label: qst701406_msg0006
rows.name:
Why? Why did it have to be him?!
And you're telling me this manual
is the only thing that's left of him?

rows.label: qst701406_msg0007
rows.name: Sharla-san...

rows.label: qst701406_msg0008
rows.name:
There was still so much I needed
to learn from him! So much more
I needed to know...

rows.label: qst701406_msg0009
rows.name: It wasn't supposed to be like this!

rows.label: qst701406_msg0010
rows.name:
Well...it's all over now, isn't it?
The trade, my livelihood... What's
the point of anything any more?

rows.label: qst701406_msg0011
rows.name: That's not true!

rows.label: qst701406_msg0012
rows.name:
The only time that someone's truly
*gone* is when you forget them.

rows.label: qst701406_msg0013
rows.name:
As long as you cherish your memories
of him, he'll live on, in your heart.

rows.label: qst701406_msg0014
rows.name: And yet I'll never see him again...

rows.label: qst701406_msg0015
rows.name:
You can see him again. In your
memories.

rows.label: qst701406_msg0016
rows.name:
That's why I wanted you to have this.
Keep it or throw it away, it's your
choice. But at the very least, take it.

rows.label: qst701406_msg0018
rows.name: *sniff*

rows.label: qst701406_msg0019
rows.name:
Oh, I'm so sorry... I really do need
to get it together, don't I?

rows.label: qst701406_msg0020
rows.name:
As his student, I should be respecting
his devotion to his trade.

rows.label: qst701406_msg0021
rows.name:
Otherwise I've a feeling he'll be
telling me off from beyond the grave!
